Uses of Package
com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser

  • Packages that use com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser 
    Package Description
    com.joliciel.talismane
    Entry-point package for Talismane - for simple usage code samples, see the com.joliciel.talismane.examples package.
    com.joliciel.talismane.en
    Classes used to interact with existing resources in English, in particular the Penn Dependency Treebank.
    com.joliciel.talismane.extensions.standoff
    A package for converting to and from CoNLL-X to standoff format, for interaction with annoation tools requiring this format.
    com.joliciel.talismane.fr
    Package for interaction with existing resources in French (such as the SPMRL French corpus), facilitating training and evaluation with these resources.
    com.joliciel.talismane.fr.ftb
    A package for reading the French Treebank in its native XML format, and writing the contents to a PostGreSQL database for ease of query and manipulation.
    com.joliciel.talismane.fr.ftb.export
    A package for exporting the modified French Treebank back into the original XML format.
    com.joliciel.talismane.fr.tokeniser.filters
    Filters specifically designed for French.
    com.joliciel.talismane.languageDetector
    A package for training a language detector, based on a set of corpora, one per language, with one sentence per line.
    com.joliciel.talismane.output
    Classes and templates for producing Talismane's output in CoNLL-X and related formats.
    com.joliciel.talismane.parser
    Transition-based dependency parsing (Parser), evaluation (ParserEvaluator), and output artefacts (ParseConfiguration, DependencyNode).
    com.joliciel.talismane.parser.features
    Various features specific to the dependency parsing phase.
    com.joliciel.talismane.posTagger
    Package enabling the part-of-speech tagging of a TokenSequence.
    The central class is the (PosTagger).
    It tags based on a previously constructed classificaton model, converting the model's outcomes to PosTag using the currently set PosTagSet.
    The PosTagSet is set via TalismaneSession.setPosTagSet(PosTagSet).
    The pos-tagger prodces a PosTagSequence which is a list of PosTaggedToken.
    It can be evaluated via a PosTaggerEvaluator.
    com.joliciel.talismane.posTagger.features
    Various features specific to the pos-tagging phase.
    com.joliciel.talismane.sentenceDetector
    Training and evaluation for sentence detectors.
    com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser
    Tokenisation package.
    com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser.features
    Features specific to the tokenisation phase.
    com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser.filters
    Token filters, which indicate portions of text to be tokenised as a single block, regardless of the statistical model (if it exists).
    com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser.patterns
    A package for the pattern based tokeniser, which applies supervised machine learning to certain patterns in the text representing ambiguous tokenisation decisions.
  • Classes in com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser used by com.joliciel.talismane 
    Class and Description
    TokenComparator
    An interface for comparing two tokenised corpora, one of which is considered a reference.
    Tokeniser
    A Tokeniser splits a sentence up into tokens (parsing units).
    TokeniserAnnotatedCorpusReader
    An interface for reading tokenized sentences from a corpus.
    TokeniserEvaluator
    An interface for evaluating a given tokeniser.
    TokeniserService 
    TokeniserServiceLocator 
    TokenSequence
    A sequence of tokens.
    TokenSequenceProcessor
    Any class that can process token sequences generated by the tokeniser.

  • Classes in com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser used by com.joliciel.talismane.output 
    Class and Description
    Token
    A token is a single parsing unit, which can have dependents and a governor.
    A token is more-or-less equivalent to a word, although punctuation (and in some case white space) count as tokens as well.
    Some languages may consider compound words (e.g.
    TokenSequence
    A sequence of tokens.
    TokenSequenceProcessor
    Any class that can process token sequences generated by the tokeniser.

  • Classes in com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser used by com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser 
    Class and Description
    PretokenisedSequence
    A token sequence that has been pre-tokenised by another source (manual annotation, external module, etc.).
    SeparatorDecision
    A set of decisions regarding each separator.
    TaggedToken
    A token together with a piece of information that is tagged onto it.
    TaggedTokenImpl 
    TaggedTokenSequence
    A sequence of tagged tokens with a score.
    Token
    A token is a single parsing unit, which can have dependents and a governor.
    A token is more-or-less equivalent to a word, although punctuation (and in some case white space) count as tokens as well.
    Some languages may consider compound words (e.g.
    TokenComparator
    An interface for comparing two tokenised corpora, one of which is considered a reference.
    TokenEvaluationObserver
    An interface that observes a tokeniser evaluation while its occurring.
    TokenisedAtomicTokenSequence
    A sequence of atomic tokens tagged with tokeniser decisions, from which a series of predicted tokens can be inferred.
    Tokeniser
    A Tokeniser splits a sentence up into tokens (parsing units).
    Tokeniser.TokeniserType 
    TokeniserAnnotatedCorpusReader
    An interface for reading tokenized sentences from a corpus.
    TokeniserEvaluator
    An interface for evaluating a given tokeniser.
    TokeniserOutcome
    A classification that can be assigned the tokeniser to an interval between two atomic tokens.
    TokeniserService 
    TokenRegexBasedCorpusReader
    A corpus reader that expects one token per line, and analyses the line content based on a regex.
    The regex needs to contain a capturing group indicated by the following strings:
    %TOKEN%: the token - note that we assume CoNLL formatting (with underscores for spaces and for empty tokens).
    TokenSequence
    A sequence of tokens.
    TokenTag
    A marker interface for various tags that can be added on to a token by various learners (tokeniser, pos tagger, etc.)
